sections.purpose: To assess analgesic activity using an Analgesiometer.
sections.scope: Applicable to pain response studies in Pharmacology laboratory.
procedure: Ensure the analgesiometer is clean and functional.
Place the animal carefully in the apparatus.
Apply the stimulus and note the reaction time.
Switch OFF the instrument after completion.
sections.precautions: Do not exceed cut-off time. Follow ethical guidelines for animal experimentation.
